title: Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots: Fun Optical Illusion Toy Kit for Kids Ages 6-10 - Create Amazing Moving Robot Art with Art & Science Play!
Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots | Djeco | BrightMinds UK
description: Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

Buy Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots. FREE UK Delivery Orders over £50. NEXT Day Delivery Available from BRIGHTMINDS. Leading UK Online toys, games, gifts & books for children which inspire & entertain!

changed_products.title: Thames and Kosmos Master Detective Toolkit

description:
Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit.

 Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs.

 Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet.

 Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key.

 The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices.

 The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams.

 Age 8+

title: Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets Craft Kit | Create Stunning American Bead Style Friendship Bracelets with Tiny Glass Beads & Thread | For Ages 8-14
Bead Loom Bracelets
description: Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets Craft Kit Create Stunning Beaded Bracelets for Ages 8-14 This delightful Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets kit invites young crafters into a world of vibrant color and intricate design, making it the perfect way to spark creativity and a sense of accomplishment. Get ready for hours of engaging fun as children aged 8 to 14 can dive into the satisfying art of creating beautiful, personalized bracelets. The heart of this kit is the specially designed loom, a user-friendly tool that makes threading tiny glass beads an accessible and enjoyable experience. It’s the ideal platform for weaving together stunning patterns, much like the popular American Bead style, allowing for a sophisticated and stylish final product. Imagine the joy of selecting from eight vibrant tubes of colorful glass beads, each a tiny jewel waiting to be strung. Kids will have a blast experimenting with color combinations, mixing and matching hues to invent their very own unique patterns that truly express their individual style. This isn't just about making pretty accessories; it’s a wonderfully enriching activity that fosters crucial developmental skills. As little hands meticulously thread each bead, they’ll be enhancing their concentration and fine motor skills. The process of envisioning and executing a design encourages imaginative thinking and problem-solving, allowing their creativity to flourish. Furthermore, understanding color theory and pattern development subtly introduces them to basic design principles. The kit thoughtfully includes everything needed to get started right away: one sturdy loom, a generous assortment of eight tubes filled with glistening glass beads in a rainbow of shades, and two bundles of high-quality thread to bring all their beaded masterpieces to life. These handmade bracelets are not only perfect for personal adornment, adding a touch of handmade charm to any outfit, but also make incredibly thoughtful and special gifts for friends, family, or classmates, showing off the crafter's talent and heartfelt effort. It’s an invitation to play, to learn, and to create something truly wonderful with their own hands.

Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets lets you create intricate American Bead style bracelets. Use the loom to thread the tiny glass beads together and create beautiful bracelets to wear or give to others. Kids will love deciding which colours to use together while creating their own unique patterns. Educational Benefits of Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets Colours & Designs. Creativity. Concentration. Imagination. Contains: 1 loom. 8 tubes of glass beads. 2 bundles of thread. Ages 8 - 14.

title: Djeco Zig & Go Wroom 45-Piece Wooden Chain Reaction Building Game for Kids Ages 8+, Creative Marble Run Toy for Endless Fun and Learning
Zig & Go - Wroom - 45 pcs
description: Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

For the love of Bees Gift Pack

description:
Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains;

  
 * The Bee Barn 
 * Natural Nesting Hay 
 * A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds 
 * Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees 
 * Lovingly packed in our Gift Box  Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain.

 Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds.

 Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees.

 This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

description:
Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium.

  
 * This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. 
 * Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. 
 * Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. 
 * Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. 
 * Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. 
 * Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. 
 * Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. 
 * Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. 
 * The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn.

description: Zig & Go Big Boom 48 Piece Chain Reaction Building Game for Imaginative Fun Get ready for explosive creativity and captivating fun with the Zig & Go Big Boom 48 piece set from Djeco! This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. These designs are perfect for copying and understanding the amazing physics of cause and effect. But that's just the beginning! The real magic unfolds when you start creating your very own courses, the possibilities are truly endless, offering hours upon hours of engaging entertainment for the whole family. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Whether you're playing solo and concentrating on perfecting a complex cascade, or collaborating with friends and family to build the most epic course imaginable, the Zig & Go Big Boom set promises collaborative fun and individual discovery. It's more than just a toy; it's an educational tool that makes learning about physics and engineering an absolute delight.

Imagine the joy of creating your own unique fridge magnets or turning your handcrafted critters into fun badges to adorn backpacks or jackets. You'll also find a generous supply of plaster powder, enough to bring 12 delightful creatures to life, ensuring plenty of sculpting and decorating fun for everyone. To transform your creations into cherished keepsakes, the kit conveniently includes magnetic strips so they can proudly display your artwork on any metallic surface. Plus, with a set of handy brooch pins, your pets can become wearable art, ready to accompany you on all your daily adventures. The kit comes complete with a vibrant paint strip boasting six beautiful colours, perfect for adding personality and flair to each unique pet, along with a specially sized paintbrush designed for little hands to wield with precision. Easy-to-follow detailed instructions guide you through every step of the moulding and painting process, making this a wonderfully engaging and educational activity that fosters fine motor skills and imaginative play. This kit isn't just about making pretty things; it's about the experience of bringing something unique into the world, from the initial moulding to the final flourish of paint. Get ready for hours of engaging entertainment as you transform simple plaster into a captivating collection of cute pets, each one a testament to your child's growing artistic talents. It's a fantastic way to encourage artistic expression and develop a sense of accomplishment with every finished piece, making it a truly rewarding craft experience for the whole family.

description: Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. description:
Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit.

 Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs.

 Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet.

 Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key.

 The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices.

 The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams.

 Age 8+

description:
A toy that grows as you do! This My First Clock is the perfect learning aid for children from 4 years upwards – it starts out as a learning toy for telling the time, and morphs into your very own alarm clock! There are multiple dials included which increase in difficulty from simply showing the time of the day to a full clock face making this suitable for all abilities. Also included are 50 double sided quiz cards to be matched up either to the clock face or digitally. Once you’ve made your guess, simply lift the flap to check your answer! Perfect for children from 4 years of age!

 Included: 1 clock, 8x clock faces, 100 questions and answers.

        Requires 1 LR06-AA battery not included. Batteries are to be changed by an adult.

title: Djeco Zig & Go Wroom 45-Piece Wooden Chain Reaction Building Game for Kids Ages 8+, Creative Marble Run Toy for Endless Fun and Learning
Zig & Go - Wroom - 45 pcs
description: Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

Djeco presents Zig & Go, a wooden building game of chain reactions requiring careful thinking. Thinking game: children need to think about how fast pieces will move - which depends on the weight - and gauge the distances between them. description_changes.title: For the love of Bees Gift Pack

description:
Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains;

  
 * The Bee Barn 
 * Natural Nesting Hay 
 * A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds 
 * Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees 
 * Lovingly packed in our Gift Box  Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain.

 Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds.

 Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees.

 This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

description_changes.title: Design Drill Bolt Buddies Race Car

description:
Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium.

  
 * This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. 
 * Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. 
 * Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. 
 * Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. 
 * Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. 
 * Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. 
 * Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. 
 * Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. 
 * The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. 
 * Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. 
 * Includes multilingual guide. 
 * Drill design is U.S. patented. 
 * Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included).       Ages 3 - 7.

Watch as up to 21 lights flash at random, then challenge your brain to repeat the patterns without missing a beat. Five new genius levels, randomised patterns, and solo or head-to-head modes make this portable hand-held brain bender the perfect way to play – at home or on the go!

       If you loved and conquered original BrainBolt (https://www.learningresources.co.uk/electronic-memory-game), then level up your memory skills with BrainBolt Genius, the brain teaser that’s so much fun, you won’t be able to put it down!

  
 * There are all-new game modes, three colours of LED lights, and colour-coded multiplayer gameplay. 
 * Train your brain! BrainBolt Genius starts off with a simple sequence, but it gets longer and more complicated as the games continue. 
 * Playing this fun hand-held electronic game improves memory and cognitive skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and builds problem-solving skills, visual scanning skills, and more. 
 * This portable, hand-held light-up game is perfect for planes, trains, road trips, waiting rooms, or anywhere you train your brain. There are two volume settings so young geniuses can play without the sound on.

Zig & Go - Big Boom 48 pcs
description: Zig & Go Big Boom 48 Piece Chain Reaction Building Game for Imaginative Fun Get ready for explosive creativity and captivating fun with the Zig & Go Big Boom 48 piece set from Djeco! This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. These designs are perfect for copying and understanding the amazing physics of cause and effect. But that's just the beginning! The real magic unfolds when you start creating your very own courses, the possibilities are truly endless, offering hours upon hours of engaging entertainment for the whole family. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Whether you're playing solo and concentrating on perfecting a complex cascade, or collaborating with friends and family to build the most epic course imaginable, the Zig & Go Big Boom set promises collaborative fun and individual discovery. It's more than just a toy; it's an educational tool that makes learning about physics and engineering an absolute delight.

Djeco presents Zig & Go, a wooden building game of chain reactions requiring careful thinking. Children copy the 3 designs in the instructions booklet to build courses, or make up their own - the possibilities are endless! This game is designed for ages 7 and over, and all the kits in the collection are compatible, for ever more inventive action-reaction courses!

  Construction game: children will need to use skill to position the pieces to make a course.
 Chain reaction game: children get to learn about the ingenuity and magic of chains of movement! 
 Thinking game: children need to think about how fast pieces will move - which depends on the weight - and gauge the distances between them.
 Step-by-step instructions for 3 designs are provided to help children build their courses.
 Video accessible via a QR code.
 Invent endless courses for hours of fun!
 Play alone or with others.
 FSC® certified wood.

 1 48-piece wooden building game with 5 metal marbles. Contents 1 24-page instructions booklet.

 Age 8+

4M Mould & Paint Cute Pets
description: 4M Mould & Paint Cute Pets Fridge Magnets and Badges Unleash your inner artist and bring home a menagerie of adorable companions with the 4M Mould & Paint Cute Pets kit, a super fun hands-on activity designed to spark creativity in little ones aged 5 and up. This exciting arts and crafts set from BigJigs Toys provides everything you need for a delightful crafting adventure, allowing you to mould and paint your very own collection of charming pets. Imagine the joy of creating your own unique fridge magnets or turning your handcrafted critters into fun badges to adorn backpacks or jackets. Inside this treasure trove of crafting fun, you’ll discover a versatile mould featuring six different irresistible pet designs, just waiting for your imaginative touch. You'll also find a generous supply of plaster powder, enough to bring 12 delightful creatures to life, ensuring plenty of sculpting and decorating fun for everyone. To transform your creations into cherished keepsakes, the kit conveniently includes magnetic strips so they can proudly display your artwork on any metallic surface. Plus, with a set of handy brooch pins, your pets can become wearable art, ready to accompany you on all your daily adventures. The kit comes complete with a vibrant paint strip boasting six beautiful colours, perfect for adding personality and flair to each unique pet, along with a specially sized paintbrush designed for little hands to wield with precision. Easy-to-follow detailed instructions guide you through every step of the moulding and painting process, making this a wonderfully engaging and educational activity that fosters fine motor skills and imaginative play. This kit isn't just about making pretty things; it's about the experience of bringing something unique into the world, from the initial moulding to the final flourish of paint. Get ready for hours of engaging entertainment as you transform simple plaster into a captivating collection of cute pets, each one a testament to your child's growing artistic talents. It's a fantastic way to encourage artistic expression and develop a sense of accomplishment with every finished piece, making it a truly rewarding craft experience for the whole family.

title: Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots: Fun Optical Illusion Toy Kit for Kids Ages 6-10 - Create Amazing Moving Robot Art with Art & Science Play!
Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots | Djeco | BrightMinds UK
description: Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

description:
Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit.

 Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs.

 Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet.

 Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key.

 The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices.

 The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams.

 Age 8+

description: Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets Craft Kit Create Stunning Beaded Bracelets for Ages 8-14 This delightful Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets kit invites young crafters into a world of vibrant color and intricate design, making it the perfect way to spark creativity and a sense of accomplishment. Get ready for hours of engaging fun as children aged 8 to 14 can dive into the satisfying art of creating beautiful, personalized bracelets. The heart of this kit is the specially designed loom, a user-friendly tool that makes threading tiny glass beads an accessible and enjoyable experience. It’s the ideal platform for weaving together stunning patterns, much like the popular American Bead style, allowing for a sophisticated and stylish final product. Imagine the joy of selecting from eight vibrant tubes of colorful glass beads, each a tiny jewel waiting to be strung. Kids will have a blast experimenting with color combinations, mixing and matching hues to invent their very own unique patterns that truly express their individual style. This isn't just about making pretty accessories; it’s a wonderfully enriching activity that fosters crucial developmental skills. As little hands meticulously thread each bead, they’ll be enhancing their concentration and fine motor skills. The process of envisioning and executing a design encourages imaginative thinking and problem-solving, allowing their creativity to flourish. Furthermore, understanding color theory and pattern development subtly introduces them to basic design principles. The kit thoughtfully includes everything needed to get started right away: one sturdy loom, a generous assortment of eight tubes filled with glistening glass beads in a rainbow of shades, and two bundles of high-quality thread to bring all their beaded masterpieces to life. These handmade bracelets are not only perfect for personal adornment, adding a touch of handmade charm to any outfit, but also make incredibly thoughtful and special gifts for friends, family, or classmates, showing off the crafter's talent and heartfelt effort. It’s an invitation to play, to learn, and to create something truly wonderful with their own hands.

Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets lets you create intricate American Bead style bracelets. Use the loom to thread the tiny glass beads together and create beautiful bracelets to wear or give to others. Kids will love deciding which colours to use together while creating their own unique patterns. Educational Benefits of Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets Colours & Designs. Creativity. Concentration. title: Djeco Zig & Go Wroom 45-Piece Wooden Chain Reaction Building Game for Kids Ages 8+, Creative Marble Run Toy for Endless Fun and Learning
Zig & Go - Wroom - 45 pcs
description: Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

image_changes.title: For the love of Bees Gift Pack

description:
Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains;

  
 * The Bee Barn 
 * Natural Nesting Hay 
 * A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds 
 * Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees 
 * Lovingly packed in our Gift Box  Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain.

 Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds.

 Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees.

 This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

image_changes.title: Design Drill Bolt Buddies Race Car

description:
Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium.

  
 * This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. 
 * Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. 
 * Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. 
 * Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. 
 * Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. 
 * Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. 
 * Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. 
 * Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. 
 * The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. 
 * Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. 
 * Includes multilingual guide. 
 * Drill design is U.S. patented. 
 * Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included).       Ages 3 - 7.

Supercharge your memory with the Genius version of our best-selling, electronic, light-up memory game, BrainBolt®! Watch as up to 21 lights flash at random, then challenge your brain to repeat the patterns without missing a beat. Five new genius levels, randomised patterns, and solo or head-to-head modes make this portable hand-held brain bender the perfect way to play – at home or on the go!

       If you loved and conquered original BrainBolt (https://www.learningresources.co.uk/electronic-memory-game), then level up your memory skills with BrainBolt Genius, the brain teaser that’s so much fun, you won’t be able to put it down!

  
 * There are all-new game modes, three colours of LED lights, and colour-coded multiplayer gameplay. 
 * Train your brain! BrainBolt Genius starts off with a simple sequence, but it gets longer and more complicated as the games continue. 
 * Playing this fun hand-held electronic game improves memory and cognitive skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and builds problem-solving skills, visual scanning skills, and more. 
 * This portable, hand-held light-up game is perfect for planes, trains, road trips, waiting rooms, or anywhere you train your brain. There are two volume settings so young geniuses can play without the sound on. 
 * It’s addictive, puzzle-playing fun for players ages 7 to 107! 
 * Requires 3AAA batteries not included.     Suitable for ages 7+

description: Kumihimo Braiding Bracelets - Celeste: Unleash Your Inner Artist and Craft Beautiful Bracelets with the Magical Kumihimo Braiding Kit! Get ready for a creative adventure as you dive into the enchanting world of Japanese kumihimo braiding! This super fun kit is designed for budding crafters aged 8 and up, offering a fantastic way to discover the art of creating intricate and stunning bracelets. Inside this comprehensive kit, you'll find everything you need to embark on this exciting journey. Experience the joy of weaving with the included colorful and sparkly gold threads, which add a touch of glamour and excitement to every design. The heart of this kit is a beautifully crafted braiding tool, perfectly sized to fit little hands, making the process of mastering the kumihimo technique an absolute delight. We've also included a detailed, step-by-step instruction booklet that's a true companion for young artists. This booklet doesn't just explain the techniques; it walks children through each stage of their bracelet-making journey, empowering them to create with confidence and pride. Imagine the smiles as you gift a handmade bracelet to a friend, family member, or even wear your own dazzling creations! With enough materials to make four beautiful bracelets, the possibilities for sharing joy are endless. The kit comes with adorable charms, perfect for adding that extra special personalized touch to your braided masterpieces, allowing for endless customization and imaginative flair. The Celeste edition boasts a delightful color palette, evoking the beauty of the sky and stardust, making each bracelet a unique treasure. This hands-on activity is not only incredibly entertaining but also helps develop fine motor skills, patience, and a wonderful sense of accomplishment. Dive in and let the vibrant threads and traditional artistry transform into wearable works of art you'll be proud to show off. Get ready to braid, decorate, and shine with your own unique Kumihimo bracelets!

Weave pretty bracelets using traditional Japanese kumihimo braiding techniques. A comprehensive kit with a detailed step-by-step instructions booklet to guide children in their creations. Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots | Djeco | BrightMinds UK
description: Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

description:
Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit.

 Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs.

 Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet.

 Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key.

 The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices.

 The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams.

 Age 8+

title: Djeco Zig & Go Wroom 45-Piece Wooden Chain Reaction Building Game for Kids Ages 8+, Creative Marble Run Toy for Endless Fun and Learning
Zig & Go - Wroom - 45 pcs
description: Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

item_group_changes.title: For the love of Bees Gift Pack

description:
Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains;

  
 * The Bee Barn 
 * Natural Nesting Hay 
 * A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds 
 * Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees 
 * Lovingly packed in our Gift Box  Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain.

 Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds.

 Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees.

 This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

description:
Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium.

  
 * This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. 
 * Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. 
 * Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. 
 * Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. 
 * Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. 
 * Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. 
 * Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. 
 * Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. 
 * The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. 
 * Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. 
 * Includes multilingual guide. 
 * Drill design is U.S. patented.

description: Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

description:
Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit.

 Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs.

 Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet.

 Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key.

 The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices.

 The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams.

 Age 8+

title: Djeco Zig & Go Wroom 45-Piece Wooden Chain Reaction Building Game for Kids Ages 8+, Creative Marble Run Toy for Endless Fun and Learning
Zig & Go - Wroom - 45 pcs
description: Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

Djeco presents Zig & Go, a wooden building game of chain reactions requiring careful thinking. shipping_changes.title: For the love of Bees Gift Pack

description:
Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains;

  
 * The Bee Barn 
 * Natural Nesting Hay 
 * A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds 
 * Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees 
 * Lovingly packed in our Gift Box  Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain.

 Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds.

 Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees.

 This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

shipping_changes.title: Design Drill Bolt Buddies Race Car

description:
Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium.

  
 * This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. 
 * Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. 
 * Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. 
 * Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. 
 * Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. 
 * Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. 
 * Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. 
 * Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. 
 * The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. 
 * Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. 
 * Includes multilingual guide. 
 * Drill design is U.S. patented. 
 * Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included).       Ages 3 - 7.

description: Kumihimo Braiding Bracelets - Celeste: Unleash Your Inner Artist and Craft Beautiful Bracelets with the Magical Kumihimo Braiding Kit! Get ready for a creative adventure as you dive into the enchanting world of Japanese kumihimo braiding! This super fun kit is designed for budding crafters aged 8 and up, offering a fantastic way to discover the art of creating intricate and stunning bracelets. Inside this comprehensive kit, you'll find everything you need to embark on this exciting journey. Experience the joy of weaving with the included colorful and sparkly gold threads, which add a touch of glamour and excitement to every design. The heart of this kit is a beautifully crafted braiding tool, perfectly sized to fit little hands, making the process of mastering the kumihimo technique an absolute delight. We've also included a detailed, step-by-step instruction booklet that's a true companion for young artists. This booklet doesn't just explain the techniques; it walks children through each stage of their bracelet-making journey, empowering them to create with confidence and pride. Imagine the smiles as you gift a handmade bracelet to a friend, family member, or even wear your own dazzling creations! With enough materials to make four beautiful bracelets, the possibilities for sharing joy are endless. The kit comes with adorable charms, perfect for adding that extra special personalized touch to your braided masterpieces, allowing for endless customization and imaginative flair. The Celeste edition boasts a delightful color palette, evoking the beauty of the sky and stardust, making each bracelet a unique treasure. This hands-on activity is not only incredibly entertaining but also helps develop fine motor skills, patience, and a wonderful sense of accomplishment. Dive in and let the vibrant threads and traditional artistry transform into wearable works of art you'll be proud to show off. Get ready to braid, decorate, and shine with your own unique Kumihimo bracelets!

Weave pretty bracelets using traditional Japanese kumihimo braiding techniques. A comprehensive kit with a detailed step-by-step instructions booklet to guide children in their creations. A pretty tool for creating the Japanese artform of kumihimo. Charms for decorating bracelets. Coloured and sparkly gold thread. 4 beautiful bracelets to make for yourself or others. Booklet provided that explains techniques and gives step-by-step instructions. Age 8+

title: Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots: Fun Optical Illusion Toy Kit for Kids Ages 6-10 - Create Amazing Moving Robot Art with Art & Science Play!
Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots | Djeco | BrightMinds UK
description: Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

label_changes.title: Thames and Kosmos Master Detective Toolkit

description:
Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit.

 Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs.

 Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet.

 Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key.

 The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices.

 The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams.

 Age 8+

description: Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets Craft Kit Create Stunning Beaded Bracelets for Ages 8-14 This delightful Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets kit invites young crafters into a world of vibrant color and intricate design, making it the perfect way to spark creativity and a sense of accomplishment. Get ready for hours of engaging fun as children aged 8 to 14 can dive into the satisfying art of creating beautiful, personalized bracelets. The heart of this kit is the specially designed loom, a user-friendly tool that makes threading tiny glass beads an accessible and enjoyable experience. It’s the ideal platform for weaving together stunning patterns, much like the popular American Bead style, allowing for a sophisticated and stylish final product. Imagine the joy of selecting from eight vibrant tubes of colorful glass beads, each a tiny jewel waiting to be strung. Kids will have a blast experimenting with color combinations, mixing and matching hues to invent their very own unique patterns that truly express their individual style. This isn't just about making pretty accessories; it’s a wonderfully enriching activity that fosters crucial developmental skills. As little hands meticulously thread each bead, they’ll be enhancing their concentration and fine motor skills. The process of envisioning and executing a design encourages imaginative thinking and problem-solving, allowing their creativity to flourish. Furthermore, understanding color theory and pattern development subtly introduces them to basic design principles. The kit thoughtfully includes everything needed to get started right away: one sturdy loom, a generous assortment of eight tubes filled with glistening glass beads in a rainbow of shades, and two bundles of high-quality thread to bring all their beaded masterpieces to life. These handmade bracelets are not only perfect for personal adornment, adding a touch of handmade charm to any outfit, but also make incredibly thoughtful and special gifts for friends, family, or classmates, showing off the crafter's talent and heartfelt effort. It’s an invitation to play, to learn, and to create something truly wonderful with their own hands.

Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets lets you create intricate American Bead style bracelets. Use the loom to thread the tiny glass beads together and create beautiful bracelets to wear or give to others.
