title: Djeco Zig & Go Wroom 45-Piece Wooden Chain Reaction Building Game for Kids Ages 8+, Creative Marble Run Toy for Endless Fun and Learning
Zig & Go - Wroom - 45 pcs
description: Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

Djeco presents Zig & Go, a wooden building game of chain reactions requiring careful thinking. This game is designed for ages 7 and over, and all the kits in the collection are compatible, for ever more inventive action-reaction courses! Thinking game: children need to think about how fast pieces will move - which depends on the weight - and gauge the distances between them. Step-by-step instructions for 3 designs are provided to help children build their courses. Video accessible via a QR code. Invent endless courses for hours of fun! Play alone or with others. FSC® certified wood. 1 45-piece wooden building game with 5 metal marbles. Contents 1 24-page instructions booklet. Age 8+

For the love of Bees Gift Pack

description:
Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains;

  
 * The Bee Barn 
 * Natural Nesting Hay 
 * A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds 
 * Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees 
 * Lovingly packed in our Gift Box  Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain.

 Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds.

 Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees.

 This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

description:
Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium.

  
 * This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. 
 * Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. 
 * Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. 
 * Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. 
 * Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. 
 * Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. 
 * Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. 
 * Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. 
 * The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. 
 * Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. 
 * Includes multilingual guide. 
 * Drill design is U.S. patented. 
 * Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included).       Ages 3 - 7.

Supercharge your memory with the Genius version of our best-selling, electronic, light-up memory game, BrainBolt®! Watch as up to 21 lights flash at random, then challenge your brain to repeat the patterns without missing a beat. Five new genius levels, randomised patterns, and solo or head-to-head modes make this portable hand-held brain bender the perfect way to play – at home or on the go!

       If you loved and conquered original BrainBolt (https://www.learningresources.co.uk/electronic-memory-game), then level up your memory skills with BrainBolt Genius, the brain teaser that’s so much fun, you won’t be able to put it down!

  
 * There are all-new game modes, three colours of LED lights, and colour-coded multiplayer gameplay. 
 * Train your brain! BrainBolt Genius starts off with a simple sequence, but it gets longer and more complicated as the games continue. 
 * Playing this fun hand-held electronic game improves memory and cognitive skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and builds problem-solving skills, visual scanning skills, and more. 
 * This portable, hand-held light-up game is perfect for planes, trains, road trips, waiting rooms, or anywhere you train your brain. There are two volume settings so young geniuses can play without the sound on. 
 * It’s addictive, puzzle-playing fun for players ages 7 to 107! 
 * Requires 3AAA batteries not included.     Suitable for ages 7+

description: Kumihimo Braiding Bracelets - Celeste: Unleash Your Inner Artist and Craft Beautiful Bracelets with the Magical Kumihimo Braiding Kit! Get ready for a creative adventure as you dive into the enchanting world of Japanese kumihimo braiding! This super fun kit is designed for budding crafters aged 8 and up, offering a fantastic way to discover the art of creating intricate and stunning bracelets. Inside this comprehensive kit, you'll find everything you need to embark on this exciting journey. Experience the joy of weaving with the included colorful and sparkly gold threads, which add a touch of glamour and excitement to every design. The heart of this kit is a beautifully crafted braiding tool, perfectly sized to fit little hands, making the process of mastering the kumihimo technique an absolute delight. We've also included a detailed, step-by-step instruction booklet that's a true companion for young artists. This booklet doesn't just explain the techniques; it walks children through each stage of their bracelet-making journey, empowering them to create with confidence and pride. Imagine the smiles as you gift a handmade bracelet to a friend, family member, or even wear your own dazzling creations! With enough materials to make four beautiful bracelets, the possibilities for sharing joy are endless. The kit comes with adorable charms, perfect for adding that extra special personalized touch to your braided masterpieces, allowing for endless customization and imaginative flair. The Celeste edition boasts a delightful color palette, evoking the beauty of the sky and stardust, making each bracelet a unique treasure. This hands-on activity is not only incredibly entertaining but also helps develop fine motor skills, patience, and a wonderful sense of accomplishment. Dive in and let the vibrant threads and traditional artistry transform into wearable works of art you'll be proud to show off. Get ready to braid, decorate, and shine with your own unique Kumihimo bracelets!
